name: Li & Yok's Delivery Service
description:
Li & Yok's Delivery Service is a party game for 2 players, where you will have to collaborate in order to make potions and deliver them the fastest possible. Navigate thought different villages and adapt to new constraints, the path of the greatest Apothecary is just in front of us!

Made by 3 LISAA students in 4 months, this game is a desire to give new cooperation experiences, where 2 people can play together.

Design section

- Ferdinand Jan

Art section

- Antoine Lecca

- Yann Esparbié
